heliohost-desc:
The “Powered by HelioHost” banner is for those who host their sites on HelioHost and want to give credit to this hosting.

1st variant: without border
2nd variant: with border
welcome_desc_index: This site was created as a kind of portfolio to show my projects.
aboutme_index:
My name is Ivan, I am a 14-year-old developer originally from Syktyvkar, I mainly develop websites. I like listening to music, coding (obviously), flashing devices.
Favorite track: Hinkik - Explorers
Playlist on YouTube Music: MusicdasH
Main device: Xiaomi Redmi 6A
Links to social media are on a separate page: Links
latest-news_footer: Data is obtained from Bear Blog via Manga Raiku Proxy
why-need-a-proxy_news: Why receive data through a third-party proxy?
proxy-explanation_news: This is necessary to avoid errors related to CORS. Since Bear Blog does not set the Access-Control-Allow-Origin: '*' header in the request, this results in the following error: Cross-Origin Request Blocked: The Same Origin Policy disallows reading the remote resource at https://mystie.bearblog.dev/blog. (Reason: CORS header ‘Access-Control-Allow-Origin’ missing). Status code: 301.
social-faq-1: It's highly unlikely to happen, 5 social networks is enough for me right now.
social-faq-2:
It's highly likely that someone is impersonating me. Please report these accounts.

I do, however, have a Bluesky profile & a Matrix account, though I'm not active there.
social-faq-1-accord: Will you ever be on Matrix/XMPP/etc?
social-faq-2-accord: I found you on a social network which is not listed here. Is that you?
